attributes.additional_details: Student nurses should be able to not stress about the ability to work and make money for things such as rent ect as the bursary and student finance is no where near enough to live every month.
attributes.background: Pay student nurses for the 40 to 48 hour shifts they do unpaid that can lead to thing such as mental and physical exhaustion

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Ensure student nurses are paid whilst they are on clinical placement
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648986
